name: 蒼葉
message: "Good morning."

name: 羽賀
message: "Good morning."
The next day, I go to work like usual. Mr. Haga is doing inventory when I get in.
The first thing I do after I put my bag behind the counter and set Ren down is go over to Mr. Haga.
I have to apologize for what happened yesterday.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Boss."

name: 羽賀
message: "Yes?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "I'm sorry about the delivery yesterday."

name: 羽賀
message: "Huh? Oh. That's already been..."
His expression darkens, scaring me a bit.
Maybe the customer yelled at him after I lost the package?
If that's what happened, it's all on me.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Um, I'm really sorry. I'd like to apologize to the customer too, if I can..."

name: 羽賀
message: "Oh, well, about that..."
Mr. Haga adjusts his glasses, a worried look on his face.

name: 羽賀
message: "The customer already paid for that item, so I needed to ask whether they wanted a refund or a replacement. But I couldn't get ahold of them."

name: 羽賀
message: "I even tried contacting the control center, but nothing."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Nothing?"

name: 羽賀
message: "Yes, nothing worked. Since the billing and shipping addresses were the same, I checked the address first, but the person there had a different name..."

name: 羽賀
message: "And no recollection of ordering anything from us."

name: 蒼葉
message: "So... it was a prank?"

name: 羽賀
message: "There's a good chance that it was. I don't understand why anyone would do that, though."
He's right. If it was a prank, what would the prankster even get out if it?
They already paid for the item. They'd just be out that money.

name: 羽賀
message: "I don't think we really need to do anything else at this point... but something doesn't feel right."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah..."
I was dragged into that Rhyme battle during that delivery. Could they be related?
An air of unease hangs over us, but there's no more time to look for answers.

name: 羽賀
message: "Oh my, we should open up."
Mr. Haga hurries out of the shop.
I don't like leaving it like this, but Mr. Haga's investigation turned up nothing, and I have no further clues.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Guess I'd better get to work."
Resolved to forget about it, I take my place behind the counter.
